== Forum and IRC Help ==
We are in the forums and on IRC to be available to help users with problems at various times.

=== Purpose ===
To provide support and assistance on the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntuforums.org/|Ubuntu Forums]]</nowiki> and the #ubuntu, and #ubuntu-us-or IRC channels.

=== The Guru List ===
Have a problem or question on a specific? Some of the Ubuntu Oregon LoCo Team have listed their special areas of expertise below. Feel free to seek them out if you need help on something they have experience with!
